pullRequest.title: DB-8846 changes in CDH-installation.md: Java Configuration Options for HBase Master
pullRequest.bodyText: (first version of this only added to olapServer.classPath)

beforeCommit.message: DB-8846 classpath has to be added both for olapServer AND spark.executor.extraClassPath

nodes.bodyText:
-Dsplice.spark.master=yarn

This looks good but it's missing the deploy-mode, I would explicitly list it even though the default is client: -Dsplice.spark.submit.deployMode=client
